title: GENICS Learning Model Application Program for Enhancing Creative Thinking and Metaskills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge for analyzing social issues and performing professional tasks
context.additional_context: Conducted in offline classroom settings where activity support via digital devices (tablets/laptops) is available

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to creatively solve complex social issues by applying the six stages of the GENICS model (Grouping-Exploring-Discussion-Individual Activity-Combining-Sharing)
Learners improve metaskills such as self-management, social intelligence, and inventive ability by over 25%

Learners evaluate 3 service/customer interaction scenarios on 4 creative thinking metrics (fluency, flexibility, originality, elaboration) using a 5-point Likert scale and justify ratings in ≤100 words.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
